anatomicalLocation._instruction: Add the anatomical entity that describes the semantic location of the pipette tip best.

chlorideReversalPotential._instruction: Enter all chloride reversal potentials for the intracellular solution(s) of the pipette measured during its use.

compensationCurrent._instruction: Enter the compensation current for the series resistance of the pipette measured during its use.

endMembranePotential._instruction: Enter the membrane potential of e.g., a patched cell at the end of a recording measured during the use of this pipette.

holdingPotential._instruction: Enter the holding membrane potential of e.g., a patched cell measured during the use of this pipette.

inputResistance._instruction: Enter the input resistance of e.g., a patched cell measured during the use of this pipette.

labelingCompound._instruction: Add the used compound for labelling e.g., a patched cell during the use of this pipette.

liquidJunctionPotential._instruction: Enter the liquid junction potential of e.g., a patched cell measured during the use of this pipette.

pipetteResistance._instruction: Enter the resistance of the pipette during its use.

pipetteSolution._instruction: Enter the solution with which the pipette was filled during its use.

sealResistance._instruction: Enter the seal resistance of e.g., a patched cell measured during the use of this pipette.

seriesResistance._instruction: Enter the series resistance of the pipette measured during its use.

spatialLocation._instruction: Add the coordinate point that best describes the spatial location of the pipette tip during its use.

startMembranePotential._instruction: Enter the membrane potential of e.g., a patched cell at the beginning of a recording measured during the use of this pipette.
